mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM MacDomainStatusInfo WHERE cmcId = #{cmcId}
mapper.insert: insert into macdomainstatusinfo (cmcId, cmcIndex, invalidRangeReqs, rangingAborteds, invalidRegReqs, failedRegReqs, invalidDataReqs, t5Timeouts) values (#{cmcId}, #{cmcIndex}, #{invalidRangeReqs}, #{rangingAborteds}, #{invalidRegReqs}, #{failedRegReqs}, #{invalidDataReqs}, #{t5Timeouts})
mapper.update: update macdomainstatusinfo set cmcId=#{cmcId}, cmcIndex=#{cmcIndex}, invalidRangeReqs=#{invalidRangeReqs}, rangingAborteds=#{rangingAborteds}, invalidRegReqs=#{invalidRegReqs}, failedRegReqs=#{failedRegReqs}, invalidDataReqs=#{invalidDataReqs}, t5Timeouts=#{t5Timeouts} where cmcId=#{cmcId}
